B

Bearing - Class in de.fhb.sailboat.mission
Computes the distance, azimuth, and back azimuth between two lat-lon positions on the Earth's surface.
Bearing(double, double, double) - Constructor for class de.fhb.sailboat.mission.Bearing
 
BEAT_ANGLE_LEFT - Static variable in class de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator.BeatWorker
The angle relative to the wind, where the boat can drive fastest to the left.
BEAT_ANGLE_RIGHT - Static variable in class de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator.BeatWorker
The angle relative to the wind, where the boat can drive fastest to the right.
BeatTask - Class in de.fhb.sailboat.mission
Task for a beating behavior.
BeatTask(GPS) - Constructor for class de.fhb.sailboat.mission.BeatTask
Creates a new instance with the GPS point that is to be reached.
BeatTask(Task, GPS) - Constructor for class de.fhb.sailboat.mission.BeatTask
Creates a new instance with the GPS point to be reached and the Task, that was executed before and is to be continued after the beating.
BeatWorker - Class in de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator
Implements a beat behavior.
BeatWorker(Pilot, Navigator) - Constructor for class de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator.BeatWorker
Creates a new initialized instance.
BoatMonitor - Class in de.fhb.sailboat.ufer.prototyp
This class represents a monitor for viewing and checking data send by/ concerning the sailboat.
